com.atmecs.falcon.automation.util.logging

Class LogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atmecs.falcon.automation.util.logging.LogManager

  • public class LogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    LogManager class implements logging mechanism. Provides the method to set the log level in runtime by declare in the config.properties if we do not set, it will automatically apply the log level "ALL"
    Author:
    gs092108

      static LogManager getInstance()
      getInstance() method is used to create an instance of LogManager First it checks whether LogManager is null, if null then create a new instance If it is not null, it will use the same instance

      This method sets the log level type based on input parameter and returns logger object

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(LogLevel logLevel)
        This method sets the log level type based on input parameter The following methods we are supporting 1. OFF 2. ALL 3. WARN 4. ERROR 5. FATAL 6. INFO 7. DEBUG
        Parameters:
        logLevel - as string
